import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../Assets/Image/logo.png' import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Autosuggest } from "react-autosuggest" const Header = () => { const [SearchInput, SetSearchInput] = useState('') const [Suggestion, SetSuggestion] =useState([]) const Searchbardata = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer.SearchBarData) console.log(Searchbardata) const dispatch = useDispatch() const changeHandler = (e) => { SetSearchInput(e.target.value.toLowerCase()) SearchBarAction(dispatch, SearchInput) } // useEffect(() => { // dispatch(SearchBarAction, SearchInput) // }, [dispatch]); console.log(SearchInput) return ( <>
Deliver to
Select location
Sign Up
Sign In
Cart
) } export default Header
